edited_stories.edited_story_text: Today was my niece Harley's graduation. She looked so elegant dressed in her graduation gown .  Luckily her brother Sam was able to get leave from the Air Force and her sister Meg was able to get off from work. I made sure to snap a few pictures of the happy trio since I didn't know when they'd all be together in one place again. It was a great day!
